plot: Deka Walmsley plays Colin, a ticket collector who can't cope with his unhappy home life and takes his feelings of inadequacy out on his passengers.
title: Ticket to Ride
plot_es: Deka Walmsley plays Colin, a ticket collector who can't cope with his unhappy home life and takes his feelings of inadequacy out on his passengers.
plot_en: Deka Walmsley plays Colin, a ticket collector who can't cope with his unhappy home life and takes his feelings of inadequacy out on his passengers.
